about_the_game:
This pack allows you to create various medieval-style houses by combining parts.

The parts are divided into very detailed parts such as walls, flooring, roofing panels, and signs, which can be combined using Bakin's sub-graphic functions to create buildings such as sheds, two-story houses, and stores, as desired.

Also, stamps that have already been assembled, such as " roof made of combined roof boards" and "perimeter of houses with assembled walls and pillars," are available, making it easier to create buildings.

The House Builder Pack contributes to the creation of "your village or town" with a variety of buildings with different details.

[House Builder Pack - Contents]
-- 3D Stamps
Building Parts : 151 (Parts of walls, columns, roofs, windows, decorations, etc. Including those made of different types of assets.)
Building Accessories: 8 (A lamp, chimneys, etc.)
Signboards: 30 (2 types of shapes. 15 types of signage icons each.)
　　　　　
Roof Prefabs: 17 (Roof boards and roof bones combined.)
Building Perimeter Prefabs: 11 (Walls and columns, etc., combined with the perimeter of buildings, excluding rooftops.)
Other Prefabs: 51 (Walls and window frames, a chair, tables, signboards, exterior staircase, etc. .)

-- Sample Maps
Outdoor Maps: 2 (Includes 18 pre-assembled buildings)
Indoor Maps: 2
detailed_description:
This pack allows you to create various medieval-style houses by combining parts.

The parts are divided into very detailed parts such as walls, flooring, roofing panels, and signs, which can be combined using Bakin's sub-graphic functions to create buildings such as sheds, two-story houses, and stores, as desired.

Also, stamps that have already been assembled, such as " roof made of combined roof boards" and "perimeter of houses with assembled walls and pillars," are available, making it easier to create buildings.

The House Builder Pack contributes to the creation of "your village or town" with a variety of buildings with different details.

[House Builder Pack - Contents]
-- 3D Stamps
Building Parts : 151 (Parts of walls, columns, roofs, windows, decorations, etc. Including those made of different types of assets.)

Building Perimeter Prefabs: 11 (Walls and columns, etc., combined with the perimeter of buildings, excluding rooftops.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: This pack allows you to create various medieval-style houses by combining many small parts such as walls, flooring, roof boards, and signboards. Pre-assembled stamps are also available for easy creation of buildings.
